1330970.name: Cymatically Muffed - Supporter Pack
1330970.description:
Thank you so much for taking a look at the Cymatically Muffed Supporter Pack! This DLC is meant for fans of Cymatically Muffed that wish to provide additional financial support to the developers. We've tried to provide some "goodies" to honor that gesture!

What does this pack come with?

Printable Assets (300 DPI Images)
  • Campaign Map 3x8 banner
  • Comics 8x3 banner
  • Box Art 2x3 poster
  • Battle Box Art 2x3 poster
  • 2x3 posters of battle maps (sets of 3) localized to all 9 languages the game is available in
  • High resolution campaign map for custom use (19080x50040)
  • High resolution of the 10 comics for custom use (4096x4096 each)

Videos
  • Behind-the-scenes video clips recorded during the game's development
  • All in-game comics animations combined into one video

Pictures
  • Photos from events where we demoed the game
  • Behind-the-scenes photos taken during the game's development

In-Game Extras
  • 6 new hair/head types
  • Battle Map - Pillow Fight
  • Battle Map - Cell Free
  • Battle Map - Transport
  • Battle Map - Wolfes Are Wild
  • Cooperative Survival Map - Invasion
  • Optional comic menu backgrounds
1330970.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
